#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        long long int N,num1,num2,num3,counter;
        num1=1;
        num2=2;
        counter=2;
        cin>>N;
        if(N==1)
        {
            cout<<1<<"\n";
            continue;
        }
        if(N==2)
        {
            cout<<2<<"\n";
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
        while(counter<N)
        {
            num3=(num1+num2)%1000000007;
            num1=num2;
            num2=num3;
            counter++;
        }
        cout<<num3<<"\n";
        }
    }



}
